t: What is the Amazon Brand Referral Bonus?
s: March 13, 2025 - Let’s delve into what the Amazon Brand Referral Bonus is all about. Essentially, this program allows brands to earn extra cash by referring customers to Amazon. When a customer makes a purchase through a unique referral link provided by the brand, the brand earns a bonus.

t: Amazon Brand Referral Bonus Program: Key Details Explained
s: December 10, 2024 - Now, Amazon is introducing a new program that is going to totally change the game. t: The Amazon Brand Referral Bonus: What to Know | Ware2Go
s: January 29, 2025 - The Amazon Brand Referral Bonus program is one strategic tool for sellers aiming to optimize their reach and revenue. Introduced to reward brand-registered sellers for driving external traffic to their Amazon listings, this program reduces referral fees by offering a 10% bonus on qualifying sales.
